get.description: Returns the secret token for a track by track id. This resource can only be used by the track owner.

parameters.description: Access, host, upload, and comment on audio.

200.description: Access, host, upload, and comment on audio.

put.description:
Resets the secret token for a track by track id. The secret token can not be specified but will be randomly chosen on
                    the server and returned. This resource can only be used by the track owner.
